text: Chim-Hing Stephanie Chan (, born July 30, 1957) is a Canadian para table tennis player who has won four medals in three Parapan American Games. She contracted polio at the age of four but began playing table tennis at the age of 44. She was the first female Canadian table tennis player to compete in the Paralympic Games in 2016. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Sportspeople from British Columbia Category:Paralympic table tennis players of Canada Category:Table tennis players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Living people Category:Canadian female table tennis players Category:Naturalised table tennis players
title: Stephanie Chan
